roleset.name: provide money for, get money for

example.name: transitive
example.text: Japanese companies have financed small and medium-sized US firms for years.

example.name: with money
example.text: [A host of electronics firms in California's Silicon Valley]-1 were financed *trace*-1 with trading-company capital.

example.name: Arg2 as subject
example.text: [Junk bonds]-1 are often used *trace*-1 to finance restructurings and takeovers.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'finance' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus

roleset.name: buy using someone else's money

example.name: car payments
example.text: Buyers financed part of a car purchase through the General Motors Acceptance Corp.
example.arg: through the General Motors Acceptance Corp.

roleset.note: These rolesets can be hard to distinguish.
